VoiceDir1.789BF: Strained, troubled. As she struggles against the chains, they only get tighter and keep coming back. Projected, said during combat.
Line1.789BF: It’s… it’s only making it worse!
VoiceDir3.BAE4: Trying to encourage Taissa as she wrestles with the memories of Andariel and the chains that keep wrapping around her. Spoken as if in the middle of a battle.
